str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
When, whenever. From hote and an; whenever; also causatively inasmuch as.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To pray, pray for, offer prayer. From pros and euchomai; to pray to God, i.e. Supplicate, worship.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From hagios; to make holy, i.e. purify or consecrate; to venerate.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Name, character, fame, reputation. From a presumed derivative of the base of ginosko; a 'name'.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From basileus; properly, royalty, i.e. rule, or a realm.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 3rd Person Singular
